H0.text: how long did the menendez brothers get in prison for killing their parents. 20 years

H1.text: how long did the menendez brothers get in prison for killing their parents. 30 years

H2.text: how long did the menendez brothers get in prison for killing their parents. 15 years

H3.text: how long did the menendez brothers get in prison for killing their parents. life

A4.text: Lyle and Erik Menendez were sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

A5.text: In May 2025, a judge resentenced the brothers to fifty years to life, making them eligible for parole because they were under twenty-six years old when they committed the murders.
